room_title: Escape room "Mission Critical" by Conundrum Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Truly amazing escape rooms that were the most creative and interesting ones I have had the pleasure to run. I've done a number of escape rooms in the area and this is definitely the best. Challenging without being frustrating or necessitating a dozen clues. Also the owners are wonderful to talk to and their kid is adorable!
